title: Person of Interest - Character Recognition: Kevin Chapman
author: CBS
comment: Hi Kevin, Fusco.  You just nailed it.  I miss the cereal references.
I like Fusco! Can't wait ti see what happens season 2.

This video is incorrect because it labels chapmen as an asset to the machine (yellow box) which implies that he knows about the machine, where in reality chapmen doesn't know about the machine even in season 4 
Sorry had to say this
description: An in-depth look at Kevin Chapman's character 'Detective Fusco' on Person of Interest.  Watch Person of Interest, Thursdays 9/8c only on CBS!
